description_en:
Suntory PepsiCo Vietnam Beverage Co., Ltd (SPVB) is a strategic alliance between PepsiCo Inc. and Suntory Holdings Limited since April 2013. Suntory Pepsico is the leading company in Vietnam beverage market, offering consumers a wide range of product portfolios like Pepsi, 7 Up, Mountain Dew, Sting, Tropicana – Twister, Aquafina, Oolong Tea+ Plus, Good Mood... helps inspiring and adding vitality to dynamic lifestyle trend for the youth in Vietnam.
“Grow Fully - Live Truly" is a commitment of the company to our existing employees and potential talents. Our values and culture will help to “Grow Your Talents” while “Enjoy work and Life” and ultimately “Win with the Best”
